group_1.textRight: I've done all kinds of tricks, but all of them@were pretty stupid...

group_1.textLeft: My spirit...is broken...@I just want to go home...

group_1.textRight: I'm sorry you've all had to go through this,@I am...but... I'm still so glad you're safe.

group_1.textLeft: Did you not hear what I just said?!@We AREN'T safe!

group_1.textRight: Still, the way things are right now, it doesn't look@like there's been any particular punishment...

group_1.textLeft: I'd rather have that than nothing!
No matter how badly our tricks flop, it keeps on@forgiving us.
That's what makes this so awful!@We're trapped in a living Hell!

group_1.textRight: I-I guess so...

group_1.textLeft: *Sob*... *Sniffle*...

group_1.textRight: There, there...
I know you've done the best you can...
So, how'd you keep screwing up?
I wanna see what you did.

group_1.textLeft: Jeez, you guys are merciless.@This whole organization...
Besides her party tricks, Sunao tried to show off@how good she is at caring for people.
Each of us tried to highlight what we're best at.

group_1.textRight: Right, since there's more to making a banquet@exciting than showing off party tricks.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah. Still didn't work, though...

group_1.textRight: This sounds like a really awful [textBlue:Rumor]...
But it's gonna be okay now, Tsuruno.

group_1.textLeft: Felicia?

group_1.textRight: 'Cuz me and everyone else...are all here with you!
With this many people present,
it should be simple to get it to admit that we can@make the banquet entertaining.

group_1.textLeft: Yuna...
Yeah, you're right. That gives me hope.

group_1.textRight: [chara:102400:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Whoa!@Did you guys hear that?!

group_1.textLeft: A voice from the heavens...?
It seems to be what's known as an Uwasa...
It passes judgment that's simultaneously cruel and@merciful...
So we need this voice to admit that we can make@the banquet fun?

group_1.textRight: Right on! Let's get it started!
What's this about?

group_1.textLeft: Do you know the smash hit drama series@"The Shaking Shogun"?

group_1.textRight: Yeah, of course.@I haven't watched much of it, though.

group_1.textLeft: The show has about 1000 episodes.
I've memorized the titles of every single one!

group_1.textRight: Really?! That's amazing!

group_1.textLeft: And now, if you give me a random number,
I'll be able to tell you the title of that episode.

group_1.textRight: Those are the rules for the title-guessing quiz?
Sure, that sounds fun!

group_1.textLeft: Let's do it!@Iroha, if you please!

group_1.textRight: I'll start with...[chara:100100:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:100100:motion_400][chara:100100:lipSynch_1] Episode 1!

group_1.textLeft: Okay!@"The Shaking Shogun Is Here!"

group_1.textRight: Woah... You answered so fast...@I'm impressed...

group_1.textLeft: ...Nah, that's no good.
Iroha, Episode 1 is too easy.

group_1.textRight: You probably don't even have to try to remember@an episode that early in a series.
It's hard to impress anyone with that.
Make it an even bigger number!
R-right, good point. Then, Episode 500!

group_1.textLeft: Piece of cake!@"Farewell, Shaking Shogun!"
It's the memorable final episode of Season 10.

group_1.textRight: That's a pretty standard title for a season finale...
It's still hard to impress anyone with that.

Th-then I'll need to pick something more random,@like...[chara:100100:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:100100:motion_400][chara:100100:cheek_0][chara:100100:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:100100:lipSynch_1] Episode 168!
Ooh!

group_1.textLeft: Got it!
"If You Can't Push It, Pull And Shake It!"
That was the part where the Shogun used his wits@to solve a complicated gender problem.

group_1.textRight: Oh, interesting. Next up, Episode 814!

group_1.textLeft: "Stop Shaking Hands With The Poor?!@My Poverty Is A Sign That My People Are Rich!"
This was an important episode where they finally@revealed the Shogun's habits.

group_1.textRight: Huh...
This has been quite fun, hasn't it? What might@you think, Heavenly Voice...?

group_1.narration: "Hmm...@I-I can certainly tell@that you are doing your best..."

group_1.textRight: Aw, that didn't cut it either.

group_1.narration: "In the first place, however,@I am unable to tell if the fanatic's guesses@for the episode titles are correct...@It's not what I expected;@it's just "eh" to me..."
"Rather, it was more intriguing@when you were goofing off talking about@the first and last episodes..."

group_1.textRight: What's your problem, punk?@You're even criticizin' our work now?!

group_1.narration: "But, well, I'm not giving up on you now.@Keep hanging in there."

group_1.textLeft: That mercy IS hard to take!@Don't even look at me right now!

group_1.textRight: This is a much tougher opponent than I thought...
